generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, flanked by sidewalks and buildings.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along both sides of the road, with bicycles parked on the left and cars parked on the right.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalks and street, providing shade and greenery.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible standing near the bus stop on the left side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the road, and a few are visible driving in the distance.
- traffic light: Red traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible, including a yield sign and a pedestrian crossing sign.
- pole: Poles supporting traffic lights and signs are visible along the road.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked on the left sidewalk near the bus stop.
